Portal dos presenta una gran mejoría respecto a su predecesor,el cual ya de por si era excelente.
En esta segunda parte volvemos a las destruidas instalaciones de aperture science por razón que conoceremos en el cómic.
Pese a esto, no es ningún intento de valve de vendernos dos veces el mismo, ya que esta segunda entrega cambia significativamente el primer título gracias a la inclusión de nuevos personajes y nuevos conceptos sobre los que reflexionar un buen rato.
No quiero decir mucho más sobre el juego para no arruinar la experiencia pero realmente lo recomiendo muchísimo.
Sin duda alguna mi juego favorito.
um dos melhores jogos de puzzle ja criados com toda certeza

The end of one era of Valve, sure theres CS.GO but that was multiplayer, this was for a long time, the end of the period of Valve making story games, the seeming end of a series, and to be honest, it is a somber feeling. Playing Half Life 1 all the way to portal 2, theres a sense of of magic, Half life alyx is a return to it, but a flawed one, valve is cutting themselves out of a huge amount of players making it vr, I dont have the same feeling as i do not own vr, thus i cannot feel the same others with vr do, and i will not say this is the end of valve games, but in my opinion it was the final stop of source engine 1, story telling for 8 to 9 years, but a goddamn glorious one, so hey this isnt just a recomendation for this game, although u must get to listen to cave johnson, no this is where i say buy half life and portal 1, buy this game, play them, and experience the old magic.

!!!!SPOILERS!!!! Somehow better than the original but GLaDOS is unfortunately a potato for most of the story, meaning you barely get to see her fat fucking cake which is such a defining aspect of her character, so I, with a heavy heart and massive balls, had to take some points off for that.

amazing game. this is my first time playing videogames, and i love it. my only qualm is that the graphics are kinda pixelated compared to the first portal game, and i get kind of motion sick if i've been playing for a while. good story, very immersive, and interesting puzzles. also, cheap for what you get.

This is one of Valves masterpieces, honestly I can't think of any negatives here. Goes very cheap on sale, literally no excuse to not own this game, one of the best and most original games, easily worth the price and a must for all PC players.

As far as sequels go, this is one of the best sequels to a game I've played. It takes all the good Portal gave to the player and it adds new and interesting thing. Whitley is also a great addition to the cast of characters and Glados is still the the bastardic AI. Please give this game a try, but after you play portal first.

Great story and graphics. The game is very optimized and runs at 220-300 FPS (Max settings) on my RX 550 & FX 4300. The Game is long, so it will take a few days to complete. I found that most of the puzzles had a great balance of easy and hard. There were no difficulty spikes or lazy puzzles. 10/10

portal shoot go pew pew

Un JEU ! 
Le genre de jeu qui commence par une intro de folie et qui vous tient jusqu'à la fin, des énigmes que j'ai trouvé moins retords que dans le 1 mais une AMBIANCE ouh la la ! C'est bien l'un des seuls jeux qui à l'ouverture n'est pas qu'un "2", qu'une suite qui est là pour faire de la moula. 

Faites le 1 avant bien entendu et régalez vous du 2, je n'y trouve rien à redire si ce n'est que j'attends encore mon cake.
way too addictive. finished it in one very long day of puzzles and fun.
the sound, story and gameplay is amazing

前言：G胖不会数三
依然延续了一代女主角和GLaDOS的故事，剧情上有了一定的补充和延续，玩法和一代相同，但是增加了很多有趣的场景道具，以及，无穷尽的创意工坊。
当然，本作相对一代更贴近FPS，尤其是最后一大关。最后一关有些地方稍不注意就看不到了，而且流程过于长。当然，虽然我不太喜欢最后一关的关卡设计，但是确实，Portal2是不可多得的游戏。
PS：有人来双人模式吗，我至今没打。
